name: Viking-gps.GitHub.io
body:
### Viking GPS Desktop Application.

This is currently a _replication_ website for [Viking](https://sourceforge.net/projects/viking) which is primarily hosted on SourceForge.

Viking is a free/open source program to manage GPS data (including GPX and KML files). You can import and plot tracks, routes and waypoints, show OpenStreetMaps [OSM](http://www.openstreetmap.org), Bing Aerial and other maps, generate [Mapnik](http://mapnik.org) maps, geotag images, make new tracks, routes and waypoints, see real-time GPS position, etc...

The latest releases - source code and Windows Binaries (32bit) can be downloaded from [HERE on Github] (https://github.com/viking-gps/viking/releases)

For most mainstream Linux distributions Viking is available via their native package managers - including at least Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, OpenSUSE and Arch Linux.

Issues and Pull requests are welcomed via [Viking on GitHub](http://github.com/viking-gps), as well as the standard patches and bug/features hosted on [SourceForge](https://sourceforge.net/projects/viking).

It is written mostly in C with the GTK+ 2 toolkit and some C++.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
